Jan. 19, 2014 D Butlins Mineworkers (Championship Section)
Butlins Mineworkers (Championship Section) 1 Set Test and Entertainments Contest Butlins Mineworkers butlins-mineworkers-championship-section
Championship
Energy
Butlins Skegness (Centre Stage), Skegness, Lincolnshire, England, UK Saturday 18th/Sunday 19th January
Set Work: Energy (Robert Simpson) Entertainment: Own Choice programme
Adjudicators: Set Work: David Read & Derek Broadbent Entertainment: Ian Porthouse & Derek Southcott Compere: Frank Renton
First Prize: £10,000 & The Warwick Vase Trophy, Butlins Trophy and Champions Banner Second Prize: £5,000 Third Prize: £2,500 Fourth Prize: £1,000 Butlins Most Entertaining Performance: Flowers (£1,000.00 and Banner)
The Geoff Dove Mineworkers Soloist Challenge Shield: £300.00 Highest Placed Mining Band: Desford Colliery
Best Soloist: David Childs (Flowers) Best Bass Section: Desford Colliery
Oct. 17, 2013, 9:19 a.m. Jan. 19, 2014, 9:23 p.m.
